Package utility.field

Class GameUnit

java.lang.Object
utility.field.FieldObject
utility.field.GameUnit
Direct Known Subclasses:
Allied, Enemy
public abstract class GameUnit
extends FieldObject
class representing all the game relevant actors on the field, this will include enemies and allies with health.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    GameUnit​(float x, float y, float health, float width, float height)
    Constructs a new GameUnit with specified health.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameUnit

      public GameUnit​(float x, float y, float health, float width, float height)
      Constructs a new GameUnit with specified health.
      Parameters:
      x - map x coordinate
      y - map y coordinate
      health - initial health of the specified unit. max health is also initialized final to this value.
      width - width of bounding rect.
      height - height of bounding rect.

  • Method Details

    • getWidth

      public float getWidth()

      public float getCurrentHealth()

      public void setCurrentHealth​(float newHealthVal)

    • getMaxHealth

      public float getMaxHealth()

    • draw

      public void draw​(DrawingSurface surface, float adjustedX, float adjustedY)
      Description copied from class: FieldObject
      method to draw the specific FieldObject. this will use adjusted values, since the DrawingSurface view is different from appearance due to map structure.
      Overrides:
      draw in class FieldObject
      Parameters:
      surface - game window
      adjustedX - view adjusted x
      adjustedY - view adjusted y

    • showHealthBar

      public void showHealthBar​(DrawingSurface surface, float adjustedX, float adjustedY)
      method that shows health bars for all game units, since they have a health property.
      Parameters:
      surface - game window.
      adjustedX - adjusted x coordinate, should be calculated to the center x of this object.
      adjustedY - adjusted y coordinate, should be calculated to the center y of this object.

    • inflictDamage

      public void inflictDamage​(float damage)
      reduce the HP of this GameUnit by the specified amount of health.
      Parameters:
      damage - damage taken by specified unit.
